component.name: Minecraft Skin 3D Editor
component.summary: Live 3D preview and editing of Minecraft player skins

description.p: A GIMP plugin that provides a live 3D preview of Minecraft player skins. Edit your skin in GIMP's 2D editor and see the changes in real time on a rotatable 3D player model. Paint, select, and fill directly on the 3D view using familiar GIMP tools â€” Pencil, Paintbrush, Eraser, Airbrush, Bucket Fill, Color Picker, and Fuzzy Select are all supported.

ul.li: Live 3D preview with composite layer rendering
Steve and Alex model variants with overlay toggle
Pixel grid overlay and marching-ants selection highlight
